Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Prairie
ShortDescription: Eastbound #47 buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Indiana, 43rd, King Drive, and 47th, due to construction near 47th/Prairie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Indiana, 43rd, King Drive, and 47th, due to construction near 47th/Prairie.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Washington/Wells
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Washington/Wells due to an injured customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Washington/Wells due to an injured customer. 

As a result of the delayed train, Pink Line and Orange Line trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Washington/Wells, Quincy/Wells, LaSalle/Van Buren, State/Van Buren, Adams/Wabash, Washington/Wabash, State/Lake and Clark/Lake).

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
